task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 20°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need the full façade including the roofline to estimate building height, so I should tilt the camera upward while staying facing the building.
With the camera pitched up I can see the roofline, so I can now give a height estimate based on the apparent ~3–4 story façade plus roof parapet.
